title: President Trump’s Efforts to Woo Black Voters
itunes:title: President Trump’s Efforts to Woo Black Voters
description:
Dr. Joanne Roberts, Chief Quality Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek National Correspondent Joshua Green discuss President Trump’s efforts to woo black voters. We get the Bloomberg Green segment with Bloomberg News Sustainability Editor Emily Chasan. She discusses the need for new incentives for businesses to electrify and decarbonize buildings. And we Drive to the Close with Kirk Hartman, Global CIO at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
